# Getting Started

This guide will help you get started with our platform.

## Installation

First, install the package:

```bash
npm install our-package
```

## Configuration

Create a configuration file:

```typescript
export default {
  theme: 'dark',
  features: ['search', 'i18n'],
}
```

## Next Steps

- Read the [API Reference](/docs/api/reference)
- Check out the [Examples](/docs/guides/examples)
